link_desc:
Hi guys,
this is a very simple template to monitor an UPS that use NIC NetAgent to manage it using network connection.

This simple template can check the status of the battery, when it use battery and other simple information about energy.

I have personally tested it on Zabbix 3.4 and it works fine.

Thanks

Federico Coppola
tags: UPS, NetAgent UPS, NetAgent template, netagent  zabbix, netagent ups template
author: Federico Coppola
